summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kristin Ess The Oversized Satin Scrunchie ? Cheetah
Review Date: 2022/05/23
Store: Kristin Ess
Product Description: ['But make it fashun! This chic satin, oversized scrunchie can be wrapped once or twice depending on the thickness of your hair. Try securing your ponytail with a regular elastic first and then put this over to maximize the look!']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Kristin Ess', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 6.26 x 1.46 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Item model number': '184-KES-0309', 'UPC': '840797141438'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:1caeab65346b101dab4627efe802e13f]] This has no stretch whatsoever. It’s literally just a super tight hair tie wrapped in a bunch of extra, unnecessary fabric. I have waist length hair and only use scrunchies because it’s the only thing that stretches enough and holds my hair. This is not it ladies.
Review Title: Absolutely not
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Arqumi Shower Cap for Women, Polyester Satin Shower Cap, Waterproof Pattern Shower Cap Bath Cap with Elastic Band, Wine Red
Review Date: 2022/07/09
Store: Arqumi
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 6.06 x 1.85 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: I struggled with finding a shower cap that could actually hold all of my hair. I have waist-length, thick hair and this held it perfectly well. It kept all of my hair inside and didn’t get wet at all. It’s good thick material, I definitely recommend for those with long and thick hair.
Review Title: For long hair.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 8PC Lazy Bird's Nest Plate Hairpin Velvet Bird Nest Shaped Hair Clips Expandable Ponytail Holder Hair Loops Nest Plate Hairpin Hair Claw Clip barrette
Review Date: 2022/07/11
Store: AhkeaDirectly
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AhkeaDirectly', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Resin', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.02 x 5.2 x 2.32 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '761312153890'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:2e5c6485a58e57540c7be371e49b8b9b]] They are really nice and they expand big enough to make any hair style you want to use it for. They are made of hard durable materials and velvet. It comes in really pretty colors to match any outfit you want.
Review Title: Pretty
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LOVE CINEMA Curl & Volume-up Mascara 111
Review Date: 2022/08/11
Store: LOVE CINEMA
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 0.87 x 0.67 inches; 1.02 Ounces', 'UPC': '795827835224'}
Review Text: Its a really good mascara , I like the fact that it doesn't make my eyelashes all clumpy and ugly. It glides just prefect and gives me the desire length I want to achieve. Good quality
Review Title: No clumping
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shower Cap for Women Reusable Long Hair Double Waterproof Large Shower Hair Hat Adjustable (11 inches, Pink, Black, Bowknot)
Review Date: 2022/12/04
Store: WhaleLife
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'WhaleLife', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 4.53 x 1.14 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '759263505189'}
Review Text: I like this shower cap is comfortable to wear and it does sure is  waterproof. The material is thick enough for water not to penetrate while showering. Good quality and price value.
Review Title: Comfortable to wear
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Big Hair Claw Clips for Women and Girls - 4.3 Inch 8 Pcs Matte Claw Hair Clips for Thick Hair, Large Jaw Clips for Thin Hair, 2 Styles Strong Hold Hair Accessories for Girls
Review Date: 2022/12/04
Store: HH Fashion
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'HH Fashion', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal'}
Review Text: Estos broches para el cabello aunque son de plástico son muy durables muy gruesos y no se quiebran tan fácilmente. Los colores son color neutrales  y los puedes combinar con diferentes colors de ropa.
Review Title: Material grueso
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Combofix 2Pcs Silk Scrunchies Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie Elastic Bands Thick Curly Hair Black Brown Ponytail Fixing Hair Tie Suitable for Girls of all ages
Review Date: 2022/12/04
Store: combofix
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Combofix', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 5.94 x 0.55 inches; 0.67 Ounces', 'UPC': '774848980564'}
Review Text: I absolutely love these scrunchies. I’ve used them every single day since I got them and they’ve held up amazing. They still feel and look like when I first got them. I have waist length, thick hair and these have no issues holding it up. Plus the silk helps not to damage your hair.
Review Title: Love them!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 8 Sheets Skull Nail Art Stickers 3D Self-Adhesive Acrylic Nail Kit Designs Charms Nail Stickers Heart Skull Snake Black Nail Sticker Designer Nail Art Supplies for Women DIY Nail Decoration
Review Date: 2022/12/14
Store: LRKNNO
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LRKNNO', 'Color': 'Flame', 'Surface Recommendation': 'Nail', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Theme': 'Skull', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Installation Type': 'Self-Adhesive', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Pattern': 'Variety Pack', 'Shape': 'Heart', 'Package Dimensions': '5.75 x 4.06 x 0.16 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: The instructions are very tricky and confusing. I feel like you have to play around with them for a while until you find the best way that works for you. Once you get the hang of them they are actually very pretty and look nice on the nails!
Review Title: Not bad!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has experienced several highly positive interactions with products focused on hair accessories and beauty items. Key highlights include a shower cap that effectively accommodates thick, long hair while ensuring dryness, receiving commendation for its thick material. Additionally, several products have been praised for their durability and aesthetic appeal, with one set of hair clips noted for their versatility and beautiful colors. Another standout experience includes a mascara that excels in providing length without clumping, emphasizing good quality. Overall, the user has favored items that enhance their beauty regimen while ensuring convenience and satisfaction.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Negative experiences in the user's purchase history center around a specific scrunchie that failed to provide adequate stretch and support for thicker hair, leading to dissatisfaction and a low rating. Additionally, the instructions for certain nail art stickers were described as confusing, indicating potential usability issues. These factors highlight challenges with product performance and clarity in user guidance, leading to frustrations that detracted from their overall shopping experience.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experiences reveal a blend of positive and negative interactions primarily related to beauty and hair care products. Positive feedback showcases items that effectively meet user needs, such as a durable shower cap and non-clumping mascara, contributing to overall satisfaction. However, the negative encounters, particularly with a scrunchie lacking adequate stretch and unclear instructions for nail art, indicate room for improvement in product design and usability. This duality reflects a varying degree of fulfillment in the user’s beauty product journey, emphasizing both successful purchases and areas needing enhancement.

target_interaction.title: Super cute!
target_interaction.text: These are actually super cute and such good quality. The color is true to the pictures and makes the perfect bridesmaid gift to add to their little boxes on your wedding day. That way you can all match on that day.
target_interaction.title_meta: Satin Bridesmaid Scrunchies Bachelorette Hair Ties Set of 6 sunglasses Bridal Shower No Damage Hairties ideas Gift for Wedding Party Favors Bridesmaid Proposal Gifts (12pcs Sage Green)
features: Good ideas Loanzeg Scrunchies bulk pack includes 12pcs hair Scrunchies and 12pcs sunglasses gifts for the bridesmaid.1pcs for you and 11pcs for your friend, Perfect as bachelorette party favors and bridesmaid gifts!
High quality Hair elastic scrunchy with a diamond card"to have and to hold Your Hair Back" Exquisite bronzing decorative cards is very cute!
Bridesmaid hair ties make of satin fabric with good texture, durable, soft and stretchable enough Beautiful decoration that can be used easily.These can use as cute bracelets.
Gift for the bride to be! Share these with your beautiful girls！All designs are for girls, perfect designs, make every girl's more beautiful!!

It is suitable for many occasions, not only as a gift for bridesmaids and brides, but also as a daily gift, teachers' day, Valentine's Day, boudoir's day, mother's day, etc. It is widely used and is a gift choice that you will not regret.
